HEIST.Settings.AutoRegisterBabele.Title: Automatically activate translation via Babele
HEIST.Settings.AutoRegisterBabele.Hint: Automatically sets up translations within Babele without needing to point to the directory containing the translations.

HEIST.Settings.AvailableCreditsOnPlannin: Credits available for the planning phase
HEIST.Settings.DisplayGamePhaseWindowOnL: Displays the game phase window on connection
HEIST.Settings.SmallGamePhaseWindow.Titl: Miniature version of the game phase window
HEIST.Settings.SmallGamePhaseWindow.Hint: Displays the name of the current phase and time remaining for all, as well as control icons for GMs.

HEIST.Global.Name: Name
HEIST.Blackjack.Label: BLACKJACK!
HEIST.Blackjack.Explanations: Agent {name} retrieves all the cards he has just played and everyone (including himself) retrieves 2 from their pile!
HEIST.Cards.RecallHand: Agent {name} recovers his hand and shuffles his deck.
HEIST.Cards.RecallFromPile: Agent {name} recovers {number} card(s) from his pile and shuffles his deck.

HEIST.JackSheet.Reconnaissance.Explanati: From 10 cards drawn, if at least 5 have the same color, then the agents will be compromised!
